text: was a Japanese fashion designer. He started Kenzo in 1970, which is a brand of perfumes, skincare products and clothes. Takada died on 4 October 2020 in Paris of COVID-19. He was 81 years old.LE CRÉATEUR JAPONAIS KENZO TAKADA EST MORT DES SUITES DU COVID-19Japanese fashion designer Kenzo Takada dies from COVID-19 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Hyōgo Prefecture Category:Japanese businesspeople Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Paris Category:Japanese fashion designers
title: Kenzō Takada
